name: M Mania
description:
m-Mania is a classic real-time strategy game with a top view. Your task is to build a base, raise an army and destroy enemies on the map. Provide dominance over the planet m-Mania, defeating enemies in 15 exciting missions.

Features:
  • The game is made in the spirit of classic real-time strategy with a top view
  • Up to 10 thousand units on one map
  • 15 different maps
  • A large number of units provides a dynamic gameplay
